TopicTitle: 1.2 Game freezes when right clicking and deleting in editor

Articles.Content:
HI all,

 I am working on a craft I started in the previous version and now when I right click on parts or delete a part there is a 2 second pause that did not occur before.

 My craft has a few, ie, 6 or so fairings so that may be causing it but I did not have this annoying pause before.

Has anyone noticed this as well?
